item.description:
You can still sign up for tonight! It's never too late!

Meet for dinner at 5:45 pm. The show starts at 7:30 pm. My cell# is 508-381-1529

We have arranged a very special deal with Claflin Hill to get almost 50% off the regular ticket price. Cost is only $20 per person. (Regular price is $35) You may pay when you arrive.

Enjoy a magnificent symphony without having to go to Boston.

Songs of America hosted by Ron Della Chiesa
* Hojnacki Toccatta, Tango & 'Toons
* Duke Ellington Harlem
* Gershwin Selections from "Porgy & Bess"
* American Spirituals and more!

Meet at the Town Hall parking lot on Court Street at 5:45 pm. We'll walk to the Turtle Tavern casual/affordable pub, located at 72 Main Street. If you arrive after 5:45, meet us over there. It's just one block up on the same side of the street as the Town Hall.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in Town Hall parking lot at 5:45 on Court Street. Or at 7:15 at ticket booth.
item.name: Dinner and Symphony in Milford
